datasetVariables.name: BSORRESU

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Standard Format

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BS.BSSTRESC

datasetVariables.description: Contains the result value for all findings, copied or derived from BSORRES in a standard format or standard units. BSSTRESC should store all results or findings in character format; if results are numeric, they should also be stored in numeric format in BSSTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Character Result/Finding in Std Format
datasetVariables.name: BSSTRESC

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BS.BSSTRESN

datasetVariables.description: Used for continuous or numeric results or findings in standard format; copied in numeric format from BSSTRESC. BSSTRESN should store all numeric test results or findings.
datasetVariables.label: Numeric Result/Finding in Standard Units
datasetVariables.name: BSSTRESN

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BS.BSSTRESU

datasetVariables.description: Standardized unit used for BSSTRESC and BSSTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Standard Units
datasetVariables.name: BSSTRESU

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BS.BSSTAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to indicate that a test was not done, or was attempted but did not generate a result. Should be null or have a value of NOT DONE.
datasetVariables.label: Completion Status
datasetVariables.name: BSSTAT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BS.BSREASND

datasetVariables.description: Reason not done. Used in conjunction with BSSTAT when value is NOT DONE.
datasetVariables.label: Reason Test Not Done
datasetVariables.name: BSREASND

datasetVariables.name: BSSPEC

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BS.BSANTREG

datasetVariables.description: Defines the specific anatomical or biological region of a tissue, organ specimen or the region from which the specimen is obtained, as defined in the protocol, such as a section or part of what is described in the BSSPEC variable. Examples: CORTEX, MEDULLA, MUCOSA.
datasetVariables.label: Anatomical Region of Specimen
datasetVariables.name: BSANTREG

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BS.BSTPT

datasetVariables.description: Text description of time when a measurement or observation should be taken as defined in the protocol. This may be represented as an elapsed time relative to a fixed reference point, such as time of last dose. See BSTPTNUM and BSTPTREF.
datasetVariables.label: Planned Time Point Name
datasetVariables.name: BSTPT

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BS.BSTPTNUM

datasetVariables.name: BSTPTNUM

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BS.BSELTM

self.title: Planned Elapsed Time from Time Point Ref

datasetVariables.description: Elapsed time relative to a planned fixed reference (BSTPTREF). This variable is useful where there are repetitive measures. Not a clock time or a date time variable, but an interval, represented as ISO duration.
datasetVariables.label: Planned Elapsed Time from Time Point Ref
datasetVariables.name: BSELTM

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BS.BSTPTREF

datasetVariables.description: Name of the fixed reference point referred to by BSELTM, BSTPTNUM, and BSTPT. Examples: PREVIOUS DOSE, PREVIOUS MEAL.
datasetVariables.label: Time Point Reference
datasetVariables.name: BSTPTREF

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BS.BSRFTDTC

datasetVariables.description: Date/time for a fixed reference time point defined by BSTPTREF.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time of Reference Time Point
datasetVariables.name: BSRFTDTC
